phases.title: Deployment-Grade Semantic Closure

checkboxes.title: Define required conformance suite matrix (sqlite + postgres where supported)
Promote sqlite execution-vs-oracle matrix to required CI gate
Add differential coverage for join/group/having/subquery operators in supported scope (having deferred until Query AST support)
Gate merges on conformance coverage threshold and no untracked regressions
Add deterministic replay artifact retention policy for CI failures
Define executable migration preflight checklist (`SafeMigration` + runtime preconditions)
Implement migration dry-run with replay verification report artifact
Implement cutover workflow with explicit pause/switch/resume boundaries
Implement rollback workflow for reversible subset with explicit failure handling
Add operator runbook and CLI commands for preflight/cutover/rollback

milestones.title: Spec DSL Ergonomics and Compiler Guarantees

checkboxes.title: Freeze v1 Spec DSL grammar and desugaring contract
Add compiler diagnostics with path-qualified errors for all rejected constructs
Add negative compiler tests for invariant-weakening patterns
Add roundtrip fixtures (`spec -> ir -> validated semantics artifacts`)
Add documentation and examples for non-programmer-authored workflows
Implement bundle registry API/storage contract (publish, resolve, pin)
Implement tenant-to-bundle/version binding with immutable audit trail
Implement bundle signature/hash verification on install
Add lifecycle tests for publish/bind/upgrade/rollback
Add policy controls for who may bind or migrate tenant bundles
Define Postgres supported-scope contract mirroring sqlite scope model
Add postgres execution-vs-oracle differential matrix for in-scope operators
Add postgres constraint/reducer conformance checks where lowering exists
Align NULL/ordering/collation semantics policy and document deltas
Add cross-backend consistency gate (sqlite vs postgres vs oracle)
Select one reference vertical and freeze evaluation criteria
Run staged workload with invariants, conformance, and migration checks enabled
Capture drift/perf/missing-primitive incidents with severity labels
Convert findings into execution-ledger checkboxes (no hidden backlog)
Publish phase report with forced-next priorities only
Define objective Phase 5 exit checklist mapped to artifacts
Require green required conformance gates for sqlite + postgres scoped matrices
Require migration runbook and cutover/rollback drill evidence
Require Spec DSL usability evidence from reference vertical
Add CI/doc checks rejecting unchecked claims in phase/status docs

phases.title: Field-Driven Concurrency Expansion

checkboxes.title: Select second reference vertical and freeze evaluation criteria artifact
Run staged workload for second vertical with invariant/conformance/migration gates
Add comparative incident register (ticketing vs second vertical) with severity/recurrence tags
Convert comparative findings into explicit execution-ledger checkboxes (no hidden backlog)
Publish Phase 6 field baseline report with forced-next priorities only
Define explicit supported concurrency model contract (stream + cross-stream boundaries)
Add causality/partial-order replay conformance suite for declared model
Add deterministic conflict outcome matrix (abort/retry/merge) with proofs/tests per case
Add migration-under-concurrency drill under concurrent load
Publish updated isolation/concurrency normative note with scoped exclusions
Freeze CLI command contract for compile/install/migrate/verify/gates
Add SDK contract tests for bundle lifecycle and tenant binding policies
Add operator playbook for multi-tenant rollout/rollback/incident triage
Add policy control matrix with executable checks
Add proven-vs-experimental feature gating across docs/API surfaces
Define objective Phase 6 exit checklist mapped to artifacts
Require green dual-backend conformance + concurrency suites
Require multi-vertical field report with unresolved criticals closed or explicitly deferred
Add CI/doc checks rejecting phase/status drift for Phase 6 artifacts
Block Phase 7 unless all checklist items are pass

phases.title: Semantic Equivalence Hardening

checkboxes.title: Freeze Phase 7 parity scope matrix (operators/null/collation/numeric behavior)
Add full in-scope sqlite/postgres/oracle differential suites
Enforce fail-fast rejection for out-of-scope operators
Publish backend parity report with explicit exclusions
Convert unresolved parity deltas into explicit execution-ledger items
Define Phase 7 concurrency contract delta over Phase 6 baseline
Add adversarial multi-tenant + cross-stream replay suites
Add backend isolation differential checks for declared invariants
Expand deterministic conflict outcome matrix coverage
Publish updated isolation note with strengthened guarantees + exclusions
Freeze executable migration protocol contract
Add tenant-batch fault-injected migration drills with deterministic recovery checks
Add post-cutover SQL execution-vs-oracle differential checks
Add migration/verify SLO and error-budget artifact
Publish migration safety report with critical disposition closure
Define objective Phase 7 exit checklist mapped to artifacts
Require green required gates (parity + concurrency + migration protocol)
Require unresolved criticals register empty or explicitly deferred with owner/date
Add CI/doc checks rejecting Phase 7 status drift
Block Phase 8 unless all checklist items are pass

phases.title: Production Equivalence and Scale Hardening

checkboxes.title: Freeze production-equivalence scope matrix (workload envelope + data diversity)

Add multi-tenant chaos drills (outage/verify delay/replay backpressure)

Add continuous SLO/error-budget gate for verify/migrate/command paths
Publish resilience report with failed scenarios closed or explicitly deferred

milestones.title: Spec and Migration Ergonomics at Scale

checkboxes.title: Freeze spec authoring pain-point taxonomy from field evidence
